segments.text: This whole scene is a powder keg just waiting to explode.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman is so utterly oblivious to everything happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink has been overflowing for what seems like ages, creating a dangerous puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is going to slip and fall, I'm sure of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And that boy on the stool! It's tilted precariously, ready to tip over at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm getting quite frustrated by the sheer lack of attention to these hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The risks of injury or serious damage are escalating by the minute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me angry to see such avoidable dangers ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone doing anything to prevent a catastrophe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for broken bones or widespread water damage is alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is honestly making my blood boil.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a clear recipe for disaster, and it's infuriating to watch it unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout at them to wake up!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of inattentiveness is truly baffling.
segments.speaker: PAR
